basic.description: This course deals with the design and analysis of research in Epidemiology. Topics include measures of health status; risk factors and associations between them; study design including descriptive, analytical, experimental and theoretical approaches; validity issues; critical appraisal; sources of data, and data collection and management. Three term hours, fall; every year.  K. Aronson.
basic.subject: EPID
basic.title: Introduction To Epidemiology
